explains: adj. 已被定罪的，被判死刑的；危险的；被责难的

sentences.en: A judge yesterday condemned heroin as evil.
sentences.cn: 一名法官昨天谴责海洛因伤天害理。

sentences.en: They condemned the deal as a craven surrender.
sentences.cn: 他们谴责这笔交易为毫无志气的投降行为。

sentences.en: Church leaders offered prayers and condemned the bloodshed.
sentences.cn: 教会领袖们奉上祈祷并谴责了那次流血事件。
